Array: * I am not your enemy,^05 but an\n  average mole.
* I would like to add a bit\n  of flavor to your experience.
* Or would a bit of advice be\n  more useful to you...?
* I'm willing to help either way!
* A few of the enemies here will\n  want you to do something\n  to become friends with them.
* For example, the UFOs will want\n  you to slow down, and the\n  robots will want to spin.
* It might be worthwhile to have\n  the human ACT-^05 err... do the\n  things they want by themself.
* They'll even change your SOUL\n  to help you do those things!
* Of course,^05 if you choose to\n  defeat them,^05 then don't worry\n  about that stuff.
